job_description:
HR & Admin Manager

Company: Armia Systems Pvt Ltd. Location: Kochi Infopark

Armia Systems Pvt Ltd. is seeking an experienced HR & Admin Manager to oversee all aspects of human resources operations and office administration. This role is crucial for ensuring the smooth functioning of daily business activities and fostering a positive organizational culture.

Key Responsibilities

Human Resources: - Lead end-to-end recruitment, onboarding, and talent acquisition processes, including negotiations. - Serve as a trusted point of contact for employees and manage grievance resolution. - Implement, review, and enforce HR policies, procedures, and statutory compliance. - Oversee attendance, discipline, and leave management systems. - Drive performance management, training, and employee development initiatives. - Ensure adherence to labor laws, company policies, and industry best practices. - Plan and execute employee engagement and retention programs to maintain a positive work environment.

Administration: - Oversee day-to-day office operations, maintenance, and facility management. - Manage vendor relationships, procurement of office supplies, and service contracts, including negotiations. - Coordinate travel, logistics, and corporate events for staff and management. - Ensure adherence to internal administrative procedures and documentation. - Support the HR/Admin budget, expense tracking, and cost optimization. - Generate periodic reports and operational insights to support management decisions.

Required Skills & Qualifications

  • Master’s degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or a related field.
  • 10 + years of experience managing HR and administrative functions, preferably in the IT or consulting sector.
  • Proven experience managing a company with a staff strength of 100 or above.
  • Strong understanding of labor laws, HR operations, and compliance requirements.
  • Excellent communication, interpersonal, and conflict-resolution skills.
  • Proficiency in HRMS tools, MS Office Suite, and general administrative systems.
  • Highly organized, detail-oriented, and capable of managing multiple priorities effectively.

Contact: If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at jobs@armia.com.
summary: Seeking an HR & Admin Manager with 10+ years of experience in Kochi. Responsibilities include HR operations, recruitment, compliance, and office administration for companies over 100 staff.

job_description:
Business Development Executive (Immediate Hiring)

We are seeking a motivated Business Development Executive with experience in the IT sector to join our team. This role involves managing client interactions, generating new business opportunities, and educating customers on product and service functionalities.

Job Responsibilities

Business Development & Sales

  • Identify, research, and generate new business leads through various channels including calls, emails, online platforms, and networking.
  • Conduct introductory calls with clients to understand their requirements and present suitable IT services.
  • Clearly explain product features, website workflows, and application functionalities.
  • Engage in cold calling potential customers and follow up with existing clients to promote services.
  • Convert leads into opportunities and consistently achieve business targets.
  • Maintain long-term client relationships through regular communication and professional interaction.

Client Handling & Follow-Up

  • Communicate regularly with existing clients to ensure satisfaction and service continuity.
  • Follow up on monthly/yearly package renewals and payment reminders.
  • Inform clients about newly released features and updates.
  • Address customer queries and provide basic functional support.
  • Maintain accurate records of all interactions, leads, conversations, and client updates.

Technical / Functional Guidance

  • Guide customers on the functioning of websites, web applications, and e-commerce platforms.
  • Explain step-by-step processes in simple language for non-technical users.
  • Provide product walkthroughs and assist with basic configurations or app updates.
  • Ensure a smooth and positive customer experience throughout all support interactions.

Job Requirements

Strong Understanding Of:

  • IT services & software solutions
  • Website and web application workflows
  • E-commerce fundamentals (catalog, checkout flow, payment gateways, order tracking, etc.)

Skills:

  • Excellent communication skills (verbal & written) and customer-handling ability.
  • Strong negotiation, problem-solving, and interpersonal skills.
  • Ability to explain technical concepts in simple terms to non-technical users.
  • Ability to manage multiple leads, calls, and follow-ups professionally.

Advantageous Skills (Not Mandatory):

  • Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Laravel, or mobile app concepts.
  • Familiarity with hosting, domains, deployments, or basic configuration tasks.

Required Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or a related field (mandatory).
  • Experience: 6 months to 1 year of experience in business development, client handling, and IT sales.

Interested candidates are invited to submit their resumes, portfolios, and cover letters with the subject line: "Business Development Executive".

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at hr@ynotinfo.com
summary: Seeking an IT Business Development Executive to generate leads, explain services, and handle client interactions. Requires a CS degree and 6-12 months of relevant experience.

job_description:
Cloud Architect - 10+ Years

About the Role:

We are seeking a highly skilled Cloud Architect with deep expertise in the Microsoft Azure ecosystem, strong hands-on experience in DevOps architecture, and extensive knowledge in building scalable microservices and event-driven systems. This role is pivotal in defining cloud strategy, establishing best practices, and partnering with cross-functional teams to deliver secure, scalable, and robust cloud-native solutions.

Key Responsibilities:

Cloud Architecture & Design

  • Architect, design, and implement end-to-end Azure cloud solutions.
  • Build scalable, secure, high-availability architectures.

DevOps Architecture

  • Architect and maintain CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps or GitHub Actions.
  • Drive automation for infrastructure provisioning, configuration, deployment, and testing.
  • Implement Infrastructure as Code (IaC) via Terraform, Bicep, or ARM templates.
  • Strengthen observability using Azure Monitor, App Insights, Log Analytics, and distributed tracing.

Microservices & Event-Driven Architecture

  • Design domain-driven, cloud-native microservices.
  • Architect event-driven integrations using Service Bus, Event Hub, Event Grid.
  • Ensure system reliability, resilience, scalability, and fault tolerance.

Security, Governance & Compliance

  • Apply Azure security best practices in identity, networking, secrets, and data protection.
  • Define governance for cost, resource usage, and compliance.
  • Ensure cloud solutions align with Zellis and industry security standards.

Collaboration & Leadership

  • Work closely with development, data, security, and product teams to align architecture with business objectives.
  • Provide best practices, architectural guidance, and technical direction across teams.
  • Participate in solution reviews, estimations, feasibility studies, and technical design sessions.
  • Mentor engineering teams, conduct architectural walkthroughs, and support production readiness.
  • Collaborate effectively with UK-based stakeholders and cross-functional teams.

Required Skills & Qualifications:

Core Technical Skills

  • 8–12+ years in cloud or software architecture roles.
  • 4–6+ years hands-on experience with Microsoft Azure.
  • Strong expertise in Azure Networking.

DevOps Skills

  • Azure DevOps / GitHub Actions
  • CI/CD pipeline architecture
  • Infrastructure as Code (Terraform/Bicep/ARM)

Architecture & Design Expertise

  • Domain-Driven Design (DDD)
  • Messaging & integration patterns
  • Distributed systems
  • Scalability, reliability, and performance engineering

Soft Skills

  • Excellent communication skills, with ability to collaborate with UK customers and stakeholders.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at r.reshma@thinkpalm.com
summary: Seeking a Cloud Architect with 10+ years of experience in Azure and DevOps. Responsibilities include designing scalable microservices and event-driven systems, and collaborating with cross-functional teams.

job_description:
Jr. Marketing Manager

Location: Kochi Job Type: Full-time Mode: Remote

Job Summary:

We are seeking a hands-on and experienced Jr. Marketing Manager with 1-3 years of experience to drive our marketing efforts. This role will involve executing campaigns, content creation, managing relationships with marketing freelancers, and setting up infrastructure to bring in inbound leads. The ideal candidate is someone who is into execution and has had exposure to managing field marketing initiatives such as trade shows, and collaborating closely with top management, sales, delivery heads, and project heads to align marketing strategies with business objectives.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Assist in developing and implementing marketing plans and campaigns across digital channels.
  • Support day-to-day execution of activities such as email campaigns, social media posts, and website updates.
  • Write engaging content for blogs, social media, websites, and marketing collateral.
  • Research industry topics and help maintain consistent messaging across channels.
  • Coordinate with design, content, and marketing freelancers.
  • Ensure timely delivery and quality of outsourced work.
  • Support planning and execution of trade shows, conferences, and promotional events.
  • Help with booth coordination, logistics, and on-ground marketing activities.
  • Assist in setting up landing pages, forms, and basic CRM workflows for lead capture.
  • Work with the senior team to improve conversion paths and track incoming leads.
  • Monitor campaign performance and maintain weekly/monthly marketing dashboards
  • Use analytics tools to track traffic, engagement, and lead generation
  • Work with sales and delivery heads to support ongoing marketing initiatives.
  • Ensure alignment between marketing activities and business priorities.
  • Help maintain brand guidelines across all marketing outputs.
  • Support content reviews and quality checks to ensure brand consistency.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelors degree in Engineering, Marketing, Business Administration, or related field
  • 1-3 years of experience in marketing Execution roles
  • Basic understanding of SEO/SEM, social media marketing, and email marketing.
  • Exposure of working with AI tools for building landing pages, design activities, content curation and marketing automation campaigns
  • Good writing skills and ability to create clear, engaging content.
  • Good communication skills and willingness to work closely with cross-functional teams.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at lavanya.a@arttechgroup.com
summary: Jr. Marketing Manager needed for full-time, remote role in Kochi. Execute marketing campaigns, create content, manage freelancers, and drive inbound leads.

job_description:
AI Developer/ Machine Learning Engineer

Location: Carnival Infopark, Cochin, Kerala Experience: 3 to 5 Years Employment Type: Full-Time, Permanent Work Mode: Hybrid

Role Description:

We are looking for an experienced AI Developer who will design, build, and implement intelligent automation solutions using cutting-edge AI technologies. Working closely with business stakeholders, you'll identify opportunities for innovation, prototype new ideas, and deliver scalable AI-driven systems that make a measurable impact.

What will you be doing?

  • Collaborating with business teams to uncover and define AI/automation opportunities.
  • Engineering and optimising prompts to ensure consistent, high-quality LLM outputs.
  • Building and deploying AI-powered workflows that connect LLMs with business applications, APIs, and automation tools.
  • Implementing RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) pipelines to integrate enterprise data.
  • Rapidly prototyping and iterating on AI solutions to demonstrate business value.
  • Advising on responsible AI practices, governance, and compliance.
  • Staying ahead of the curve with emerging AI tools, frameworks, and trends.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Build, develop and deploy AI applications
  • Design and Develop AI services
  • Setup and develop data ingestion pipelines and components
  • Develop search related components using Azure AI Search
  • Developing and deploying AI/ML models
  • Built and maintain scalable, high-performance AI apps on Azure
  • Create and maintain secure AI platform
  • Collaborate cross-functionally to understand requirements

Preferred Skills & Qualifications:

  • Hands-on experience with LLMs (e.g. GPT, Claude, LLaMA, Azure Cognitive Services, Azure Functions, and Logic Apps.) and prompt engineering.
  • Familiarity with LangChain, LlamaIndex, or similar frameworks.
  • Experience using automation platforms (UiPath, Power Automate, Zapier, n8n) and APIs.
  • Knowledge of vector databases and embeddings for RAG pipelines.
  • Excellent communication skills and the ability to translate business needs into technical solutions.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at careers@sparksupport.com
summary: AI Developer/ML Engineer to build intelligent automation solutions. Responsibilities include prompt engineering, RAG pipelines, and deploying AI apps on Azure. Requires 3-5 years of experience.

job_description:
Service Desk Engineer – Level 1

Job Designation: Service Desk Engineer – L1 Employment Type: Full-time | Onsite | 24×7 rotational shifts Experience: 1–3 years in IT Helpdesk/Service Desk

About the Role:

The Service Desk Engineer will act as the first point of contact for all IT users, providing remote and desk-side support for incidents and service requests. The role ensures timely logging, categorization, initial troubleshooting, FCR resolution, and escalation to L2/L3 teams while maintaining SLA compliance and high customer satisfaction.

Key Responsibilities (Detailed):

  • Receive and handle all user issues through calls, emails, chat, and ticketing tools.
  • Log, categorize, and prioritize incidents and service requests.
  • Perform basic troubleshooting for OS, applications, network, and hardware.
  • Provide First-Call-Resolution (FCR) for L1 scope issues.
  • Escalate unresolved tickets to L2/L3 teams with complete diagnostics.
  • Track and follow up on assigned tickets until closure.
  • Monitor SLA response and resolution timelines and flag deviations.
  • Prepare daily/weekly/monthly helpdesk performance reports.
  • Maintain and update knowledge base articles, SOPs, and troubleshooting guides.
  • Conduct periodic user feedback and support CSAT target ≥99%.

Required Skills & Experience:

  • Strong communication and customer handling skills.
  • Exposure to ITSM ticketing tools (ManageEngine, ServiceNow, etc.).
  • Basic knowledge: Windows OS, MS Office, printers, and network basics.
  • Ability to troubleshoot common issues (password, Outlook, VPN, etc.).
  • Understanding of incident, request, escalation, & SLA processes.
  • Ability to work in rotational shifts, including night shifts.

Contact: If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at stiny.bastin@gramproindia.com
summary: Seeking a Service Desk Engineer (L1) for a full-time, onsite role with 1-3 years of experience. You will provide first-level IT support, troubleshooting, and escalate issues to maintain high customer satisfaction.

job_description:
Datacenter Operations Engineer – 24×7

Employment Type: Full-time | Onsite DC | Shift-based

Experience: 2–4 years in DC monitoring & operations

About the Role:

Responsible for monitoring and managing all IT infrastructure components within the datacenter including servers, storage, network devices, firewalls, SSL certificates, and critical applications. Ensures that alerts are captured, validated, logged, and escalated as per SOPs.

Key Responsibilities (Detailed):

  • Monitor server CPU, memory, partitions, and availability.
  • Monitor OS-level and application services (DB, middleware, AD, etc.).
  • Monitor SAN/NAS & storage health parameters.
  • Monitor network devices (routers, switches, firewalls) for availability.
  • Track link status, bandwidth usage, packet drops, and interface issues.
  • Monitor SSL certificate expiries and coordinate renewals.
  • Identify critical alerts, validate, and raise tickets.
  • Coordinate with L2/L3 towers for patching and maintenance activities.
  • Ensure correct escalation for Sev1/Sev2 alerts.
  • Maintain daily DC health reports and monthly MIS.

Required Skills & Experience:

  • Good understanding of server OS (Windows/Linux).
  • Knowledge of network fundamentals (routing, switching, firewalls).
  • Familiarity with SAN/NAS storage.
  • Experience with monitoring tools (SolarWinds, Nagios, OpManager).
  • Strong analytical and alert-handling capability.
  • Ability to work in 24×7 DC environment.

Contact:

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at stiny.bastin@gramproindia.com
summary: Responsible for 24x7 datacenter operations, monitoring IT infrastructure, and escalating alerts. Requires 2-4 years of experience in DC monitoring and operations.

job_description:
BigFix Engineer (L2)

Job Designation: BigFix Engineer – Endpoint Tools Management (L2) Employment Type: Full-time | Onsite Experience: 3–5 years in Endpoint/Patch Management Tools

About the Role:

The BigFix Engineer will administer and maintain the IBM BigFix infrastructure used for enterprise-wide endpoint management and security compliance. This includes managing BigFix servers, relays, and clients; ensuring patch baselines are up to date; troubleshooting agent health; and ensuring all endpoints meet compliance standards.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Manage, maintain, and optimize the IBM BigFix Server, Relay Servers, and Client infrastructure.
  • Configure and update patch baselines, fixlets, tasks, and site subscriptions.
  • Monitor BigFix agent deployment, status, health, and version compliance.
  • Troubleshoot client issues related to agent communication, relay selection, and patch failures.
  • Manage BigFix WebUI, operator roles, permissions, and RBAC configurations.
  • Review dashboards for patch compliance and take corrective actions.
  • Coordinate patch deployment cycles with Windows/Linux/Infrastructure teams.
  • Generate reports on patching, compliance, software inventory, and vulnerabilities.
  • Perform upgrades, apply patches, and maintain platform stability.
  • Support software deployment and compliance policies using BigFix.
  • Document SOPs, patching procedures, and troubleshooting guidelines.

Required Skills & Experience:

  • Strong hands-on experience with IBM BigFix architecture (Server, Relay, Client).
  • Experience with patch management across Windows & Linux endpoints.
  • Knowledge of BigFix Fixlets, Tasks, Baselines, Action Scripts, and Custom Content.
  • Understanding of endpoint compliance, vulnerability remediation, and OS hardening.
  • Familiarity with RBAC, AD integration, and role-based permissions.
  • Experience coordinating patch cycles in enterprise environments.
  • Strong troubleshooting and reporting skills.
  • Knowledge of PowerShell, Shell scripting (preferred).

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at stiny.bastin@gramproindia.com
summary: Administer and maintain IBM BigFix for endpoint management and security compliance. Responsibilities include server management, patch deployment, and troubleshooting client issues.

summary: Seeking a Middleware Administrator with 4-5 years of experience to manage platforms like WebLogic and WSO2. Responsibilities include installation, configuration, troubleshooting, and support.

job_description:
MS SQL Database Administrator – L2

Job Designation: MS SQL Database Administrator – Level 2 Employment Type: Full-time | Onsite

Experience: 3–5 years of MS SQL Server administration.

About the Role: As an MS SQL DBA, you will manage, maintain, and optimize SQL Server databases across production and DR environments. You will ensure performance tuning, high availability, backup/recovery readiness, and support day-to-day operations for banking and enterprise applications.

Key Responsibilities: - Manage installation, configuration, and administration of MS SQL Server databases - Perform regular backup & recovery using native SQL Server tools - Monitor performance metrics using SQL Profiler, DMVs, and Extended Events - Optimize slow queries, indexes, and database schemas - Perform patching, version upgrades, migrations - Monitor events, logs, deadlocks, blocking sessions - Implement high-availability (HA) methods: Failover Cluster, AlwaysOn AG - Perform security hardening and user/role management - Support application deployment and DB release activities - Participate in DR drills, replication verification, and failover testing - Provide daily monitoring reports & capacity planning inputs

Required Skills & Experience: - Strong hands-on knowledge of SQL Server 2012/2014/2016/2019 - Experience in AlwaysOn, clustering, backup/restore, log shipping - Strong T-SQL querying, troubleshooting, and performance tuning - Familiarity with SSIS, SSRS (added advantage) - Understanding of Windows Server OS & AD integration - Experience in banking/financial domain preferred - Good communication, RCA preparation & documentation skills

Contact: If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at stiny.bastin@gramproindia.com
summary: Manage, maintain, and optimize SQL Server databases. Ensure performance, high availability, and backup readiness for banking applications.

job_description:
MySQL Database Administrator – L2

Job Designation: MySQL Database Administrator – Level 2 Employment Type: Full-time | Onsite

About the Role: The MySQL DBA will manage MySQL databases used by enterprise applications, ensuring reliability, performance, and security. The role includes replication setup, performance tuning, capacity planning, and backup/recovery management.

Key Responsibilities: - Install, configure, upgrade, and administer MySQL databases - Manage MySQL replication setups (Master–Slave, GTID, Multi-source) - Conduct performance tuning, slow query analysis, and index optimization - Perform backup and restore using mysqldump, MySQL Enterprise Backup, or Percona Tools - Monitor error logs, slow logs, connections, buffer pools, and memory utilization - Handle schema changes, storage engine management (InnoDB preferred) - Implement partitioning, sharding, and optimization strategies - Ensure DB security, user privileges, SSL/TLS configuration - Support high-availability solutions (Galera Cluster, Percona XtraDB) - Conduct regular DR testing & ensure data consistency - Prepare reports for DB performance, capacity, and health

Required Skills & Experience: - 3–5 years in MySQL/MariaDB administration. - Strong knowledge of MySQL 5.7 / 8.0 - Hands-on experience in replication, clustering, performance tuning - Experience with Linux (RHEL/AIX) as MySQL runs primarily on Linux - Knowledge of backup utilities like Percona XtraBackup - Understanding of DB security, encryption, and hardening - Exposure to monitoring tools (Nagios, Prometheus, Grafana) - Experience supporting banking or mission-critical applications (preferred)

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at stiny.bastin@gramproindia.com
summary: Seeking a MySQL DBA (L2) with 3-5 years of experience to manage enterprise databases, ensuring reliability and performance. Responsibilities include replication, tuning, and backup/recovery.

job_description:
Senior .Net Developer

We are looking for an experienced .NET Developer with a strong background in ASP.NET and .NET Core development. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, testing, and maintaining high-performance enterprise applications. You should be passionate about clean code, scalable architecture, API development, and working with modern cloud-based technologies.

Key Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, and implement enterprise-grade applications using ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Web API, and .NET Core.
  • Build RESTful APIs, microservices, and backend services with optimized performance.
  • Participate in requirement analysis, solution design, technical documentation, and code reviews.
  • Write clean, efficient, testable, and reusable code following best practices and coding standards.
  • Integrate third-party services, databases, and cloud resources using secure patterns.
  • Work collaboratively with cross-functional teams including QA, DevOps, and UI/UX.
  • Troubleshoot production issues, perform RCA, and apply performance optimizations.
  • Implement automated unit testing, integration testing, and CI/CD best practices.
  • Participate in Agile/Scrum ceremonies including sprint planning, story estimation, and demos.

Required Skills & Experience

  • 5+ years of hands-on development experience with ASP.NET and .NET Core frameworks.
  • Strong knowledge of C#, OOPS concepts, design patterns, and SOLID principles.
  • Experience in developing REST APIs, Web Services, Microservices architecture.
  • Strong experience with Entity Framework / EF Core and SQL databases (SQL Server, PostgreSQL, or MySQL).
  • Hands-on experience with JavaScript/TypeScript and front-end technologies (React/Angular is a plus but not mandatory).
  • Good understanding of authentication & authorization mechanisms (JWT, OAuth, Identity Server, etc.).
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP (Azure preferred).
  • Experience with Git, DevOps pipelines, CI/CD tools (Azure DevOps, GitHub Actions, or Jenkins).
  • Solid understanding of application security, performance tuning, and debugging.

Good to Have

  • Experience with Microservices, Docker, Kubernetes, or serverless functions.
  • Knowledge of Message brokers (RabbitMQ, Kafka, SQS, or Azure Service Bus).
  • Exposure to Domain Driven Design (DDD) and Clean Architecture.
  • Familiarity with unit testing frameworks (xUnit, NUnit, MSTest).
  • Experience working with ORM optimization and query performance tuning.
  • Knowledge of logging and monitoring tools (Serilog, ELK/Grafana, App Insights).

Education

  • Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent professional experience)

Soft Skills

  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Strong communication and collaboration abilities
  • Ability to own features end-to-end and work independently
  • Willingness to learn modern patterns and new technologies

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at ajish.prabhakaran@focaloid.com
summary: Seeking a Senior .NET Developer with 5+ years of experience in ASP.NET and .NET Core. Responsibilities include designing, developing, and maintaining enterprise applications and APIs.

job_description:
Backend Developer (Java)

Job Summary:

We are seeking a motivated and talented Java/Back End Developer with 5-6 years of hands-on development experience to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in Java development and be eager to learn and grow in a fast-paced, innovative environment. You will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining robust and scalable applications, working closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and maintain high-quality Java-based applications.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  • Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
  • Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs.
  • Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation.
  • Develop and integrate RESTful APIs.
  • Implement and manage CI/CD pipelines to streamline development and deployment processes.
  • Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback.
  • Stay up-to-date with industry trends and technologies to ensure our applications are current and competitive.

Required Qualifications:

  • 5-6 years of hands-on development experience in Java.
  • Experience in application development using Spring and Spring Boot frameworks.
  • Proficient in SQL programming.
  • Experience with REST API development and integration.
  • Familiarity with integration patterns and best practices.
  • Basic understanding of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently or as part of a team.
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills.

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Knowledge of cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
  • Familiarity with containerization tools like Docker and Kubernetes.
  • Basic experience with front-end technologies like Next.js, React, and Node.js.
  • Knowledge of Agile/Scrum methodologies.

Education:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.

Contact:

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at hr@tecforz.com
summary: Seeking a Java Back End Developer with 5-6 years of experience in designing, implementing, and maintaining scalable applications. Responsibilities include API development, CI/CD, and collaborating with teams.
